data.title: Paulo Moura Castro
data.text:
Paulo is a partner in the Advisory area at BDO, and is also responsible for the Braga office. He has 23 years of professional experience in the areas of corporate finance, management control and investment incentives.

With a particular focus on the industrial area, Paulo has successfully supported clients in substantial investments, including greenfield projects, expansions and mergers and acquisitions.

Graduated in Management, he has a Specialization in Corporate Finance and a Postgraduate Degree in Corporate Finance and Control. He also attended several executive courses in Leadership, Strategy and Innovation.
